title: Detroit disaster and a Kelce farewell? - Christmas Day in the NFL
subtitle: The Detroit Lions suffer a disastrous defeat that ends their play-off hopes while Denver beat Kansas City in what could be Travis Kelce's final home game for the Chiefs.
full_text: The Detroit Lions suffer a disastrous defeat that ends their play-off hopes while Denver beat Kansas City in what could be Travis Kelce's final home game for the Chiefs.
